# RCSService.RevokeMessageRequest

**Structure**

A structure that respresents a request to revoke a previously sent message.

## Declaration

```swift
struct RevokeMessageRequest
```

## Creating a revoke request

- **init(cellularServiceID:handle:messageID:)**

## Accessing request properties

- **cellularServiceID**: The service identifier to use for this request.
- **handle**: A handle associated with the message to revoke.
- **messageID**: The message identifier to revoke.

## Revoking messages

- **revokeMessage(_:)**: Requests revocation of an RCS message.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: The service identifier to use for this request.
items.name: cellularServiceID

items.description: A handle associated with the message to revoke.
items.name: handle

items.description: Requests revocation of an RCS message.

title: RCSService.RevokeMessageRequest
